title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2657.8 - Denial of request for a record or amendment or correction of a record or personal information
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2657.8 - Denial of request for a record or amendment or correction of a record or personal information

State Regulations

Denial of a request for records or amendment or correction
of a record or personal information shall: (a) be in writing, explaining the reasons
therefor; and
(b) identify the
person to whom an appeal may be directed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2657.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
